title: Rama-Rajya: A Vision of Harmony and Prosperity | Sri Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.text: Simply by the twanging of the bow of Lord Rama, Ravana instantly lost his life.
Birth, death, disease and old age which pervade this entire material world.
Nobody is free from these four problems.
Lord Ramachandra's rule made the entire earth equal to Brahmaloka.
So these are all the descriptions of how Lord Ramachandra ruled over.
How did this happen? How did this become possible on this earth?
The whole world was inundated with the chanting of the holy name of Lord Rama.
Ramo Ramo Rama
Regarding the rule of Lord Ramachandra, the Skanda Purana states
As long as Lord Ramachandra ruled over, ruled over what?
Samastam Kshiti Vandalam
Kshiti means the earth. Kshiti Vandala means the earth globe.
The entire earth was ruled over by Lord Ramachandra during his time.
As long as Lord Ramachandra ruled over the earth,
Samastam Kshiti Vandalam
The entire earth planet
Brahmaloka Samam Chakra
Lord Ramachandra's rule made the entire earth equal to Brahmaloka.
Brahmaloka here refers to the spiritual world
which is where Brahman sustains the spiritual world.
So it is called Brahmaloka which is also known as Vaikuntha.
The spiritual world is called Vaikuntha meaning it is Vigatakuntha
meaning it is the place where there is no misery at all.
Hence during the reign of Lord Ramachandra
the entire earth was ruled over by Lord Ramachandra.
He was rid of all kinds of miseries,
there were no natural calamities.
The weather was always pleasant
with the summers and winters appearing like springtime
without excessive heat or excessive cold.
The earth always produced grains, fruits, and vegetables abundantly.
No one ever went hungry.
The pangs of old age and disease were unknown to the citizens.
No son died in the present.
of his father meaning everyone lived long lives and no one died young not only that there was no
death for anyone who did not want it so these are all the descriptions of how Lord Ramachandra
ruled over how did this happen how did this become possible on this earth because Ramo Ramo Ramayati
Sarveshram everyone was only chanting Ramo Ramo Rama the whole world was inundated with the
chanting of the holy name of Lord Rama being drowned in the flood of chanting the holy name
of Lord Ramachandra everyone was floating in the ocean of love of Godhead and so no miseries could
touch them this is because in Vaikuntha everyone is similarly drowned in loving
chanting of the holy name of Lord Ramachandra and so no miseries could touch them this is because
chanting and serving the supreme personality of Godhead a similar situation emerged on the earth
during the rule of Lord Ramachandra it was exactly like the spiritual world the entire
earth became as good as Vaikuntha being filled with the reverberation of the holy name of Lord
Ramachandra and like this Lord Ramachandra converted the whole earth to Vaikuntha
Lord Ramachandra ruled the earth for 13 000 years and created a Vaikuntha atmosphere on the entire
earth with every millimeter of the globe being pervaded with the chanting of the holy names of
Lord Ramachandra and the only work being done by Lord Ramachandra was the worship of Lord Ramachandra
and the devotional service to Lord Ramachandra for everyone who was there at that point of time
even now if we want the same Rama Rajya we can create it what is the secret for creating Rama
Rajya the secret is not economic development it is not military or political power
Ravana in fact had all these his Lanka was called Svarna Lanka why because every house in Lanka with
was cladded with gold. The richest of the people in the world today clad their houses with Italian
marble or granite or some expensive stuff like that. But during Ravana's rule, every house was
clad with actual gold. Can you imagine that? That was, we can imagine the economic powerhouse
Lanka had become under Ravana. And moreover, the military power of Ravana was unrivaled in this
whole universe. But despite all this economic and military and personal power, what happened?
Ravana was quickly destroyed along with his life breath. Why? Because Dara means wife.
Dara means because he stole the wife of Lord Rama. Because Ravana abducted Sita Devi,
his lifespan was...
cut short. And how was it cut short? Vispurjita Dhanusha. Simply by the twanging of the bow of Lord
Rama, Ravana instantly lost his life. Lord Ramachandra did not have to take any big endeavor.
Simply by the twanging of his bow. So we can see from this that although Ravana had immense
economic and military power, his citizens are not described to be free from anxiety and filled with
bliss like the citizens of Lanka. And so, Ravana was cut short. And how was it cut short? Vispurjita Dhanusha.
Therefore, his state resulting from his death feeling that he
was being whisky. Why there became like this? Why did he need some power? This can be understood
under the rule of Lord Rama Chandra. That means economic, scientific, medical, political
and military power are not the real cause of happiness amongst the people. Then, what can bring Ramarajya
back? The secret is...

4. Kamak Dracula. We do not control the the world. All human Dunya. Uh,been constante due to Anda's
devoid of all distresses, then it is inundated with Ramo Ramo Rama Iti.
If we fill our lives and the world with chanting the Hare Krishna Mahamantra,
Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare,
Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare.
If we fill our lives and the world with this Hare Krishna Mahamantra,
then the world can again experience Ramaraja,
a world full of immense happiness and love of Godhead, Krishna Prema.
So the Srimad Bhagavatam says that
Even though Kali Yuga is filled with so many faults,
so many flaws, so many problems, full of distresses,
still there is one Lord.
One great, good quality, auspicious quality in Kali Yuga.
What is that?
Keertanadeva Krishnasya
Simply by performing this Keertana
or singing and chanting of the Hare Krishna Mahamantra,
what will happen?
Keertanadeva Krishnasya Muktasangaha
One will become free from all attachments in this material world
and Parambarajet, we will be able to go back to the spiritual world
which is Vaikuntha, free from all distresses,
free from the problems of birth,
death, disease and old age which pervades this entire material world.
Nobody is free from these four problems.
If we want real freedom from these four problems,
then we have to take shelter of the holy name of Krishna and Rama,
we have to chant Hare Krishna Mahamantra,
we have to remember Lord Ramachandra's pastimes, Lord Krishna's pastimes
and then our lives can become completely blissful
and the effects of birth, death, disease and old age
will become diminished in our life.
